name: ASL for Beginners (Vowels Edition)
description:
Disclaimer: I am still new to ASL, wanting to make a game that has benefits. I present to you my game, the ASL for beginners.

I refer to the internet for the alphabetical signs.

This is an ASL highscore game made in gamemaker studio 2, coded in GML.

I hope this game will help you learn a thing or two (or five) about ASL :D

Credits:

Codes:

Youtube : Gamemaker - Menus with Submenus #1 (GML) - Slyddar

Pictures:

https://www.flickr.com/photos/129115373@N03/24846705455 - ASL signs (paper cutout)

Sounds:

Soundsnaps:

Video game, sprightly unlocking alert.

Big beat with claps

Two hollow toned blips. 

Sound design button beep: analog bloop

Wrong answer game over alert (2).

App – inverted, plugging selection sound (1).
